item.title: Monitoring temperature and humidity with a Raspberry Pi 3, DHT22 sensor, InfluxDB and Grafana
item.description: I recently started looking into ways of monitoring the temperature and humidity in my garage - for two reasons. Firstly, I have my lab workload cluster out there in the form of a Dell C6100, and I’ve noticed with the recent weather that the temperature in there getsâ€¦a bit warm. Secondly, I like to brew beer at home, and one of the keys to a good brew is consistent temperature!
